Anna Lorck: Hawke’s Bay Regional Council’s new rating pie has been served cold https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/anna-lorck-hawkes-bay-regional-councils-new- rating-pie-has-been-served-cold/SH3W45XOMFE6VAC2KA6NND6ER4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/anna-lorck-hawkes-bay-regional-councils-new- rating-pie-has-been-served-cold/SH3W45XOMFE6VAC2KA6NND6ER4/ Anna LorckOpinion: The best pie the regional council could eat right now is a humble one.
